title: Check Park Pavilion Availability
description: A citizen wants to reserve a park pavilion for a birthday party and needs to check availability.

tasks.description: Identify the park and pavilion the citizen is interested in.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the details of the desired location.

tasks.description: Check the reservation calendar for the requested date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the calendar and finds that the pavilion is available on that date.

tasks.description: Inform the citizen of the availability and provide instructions on how to officially reserve and pay for it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear answer and guides the citizen to the next step.
